data.title: BEAUTIFUL BRANT LAKE LAKESIDE CABIN FOR RENT, Brant Lake (VR7653)
data.text:
REVIEWS*

Date of Stay: June 2024

Posted On: 6/29/24 by Tom W.

“My wife and I had an excellent June vacation at Horicon 18. Dave was a great host, and responded quickly to any questions. The house is located on a low-traffic residential street in a Adirondack wooded setting (nice for walks). It's obvious that the house and property are well maintained - kitchen, laundry, and bedrooms were clean and have lots of sunlight. There is a gradual sand-access area to the beautiful lake, and a nice dock where we moored our small boat. We've stayed at several properties on Brant Lake, and Horicon 18 is a winner.”

Owner's Response

“Glad you all had a good time! Some coolish nights, but a lovely and quiet June week!”

Date of Stay: August 2011

Posted On: 3/1/12 by Cathi T.

“Our family has had the good fortune to have rented "18" for a week each summer for the past 25+ years. Our boys (now grown men) have wonderful memories of their vacations there. The cabin is located in one of the best sections of beautiful Brant Lake - secluded from the main road so no worries with young children. And privacy from your neighbors. It is definitely a "little piece of heaven".”

Print Reviews

*Reviews and owner responses are the subjective opinions of the reviewers and owners. They are not the opinions of Adirondack "By Owner", LLC and are not endorsed by us. We do not investigate the accuracy of property listings, reviews, or owner responses. Please see our Important Notice & Disclaimer for more details.
